attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the recycling facilities in my area only cater for the recycling of plastic bottles, cans and paper, but I want the prime minister to take a step towards enforcing that all material be recycled, including those awful ready meal containers. And what about crisp packets? no-one recycles those. Please read my petition and sign it, and prime minister Mr Brown, listen up, your nation has spoken!
